CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <!-- ============================================================== Filter to create a Citation QC Report ============================================================== --> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl = "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version = "1.0" xmlns:cdr = "cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr">
<xsl:output method = "text"/>
<!-- ================================================================== Create HTML Output Updated on February 13, 2002 by C. Burg Updated on July 16, 2002 to include formatted reference <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC '-//IETF//DTD HTML//EN' /> ================================================================== --> <xsl:template match = "/"> <xsl:apply-templates select = "Citation"/> </xsl:template>
<!-- ===================================================================== Template to display Citation Report ===================================================================== --> <xsl:template match = "Citation"> <xsl:value-of select = "FormattedReference"/> </xsl:template> </xsl:transform>
